name: One Night At Stitchy's
description:
my first fnaf game

if mudkip appears just touch him and hes gone DONE

torchic ,stitch,mudkip sprite credit goes to @GreenCreeps

and a few tips if your camera glitches it means mudkip is glitching your cam onpurpose and if you want to get out of it keep moving your mouse all over the screen and click all of the buttons to close the doors and thats it you got out of it!
